result.eng: I'll be talking to you again.
result.ga: Beidh mé ag caint leat arís
result.orig: Beidh mé ag caint leat arís
result.html: Beidh mé ag caint leat arísI'll be talking to you again.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mé ag caint leat arísI'll be talking to you again.

result.html: Bhí siad ag caint fúmsaThey were talking about me.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag caint fúmsaThey were talking about me.

result.eng: What are we talking about tonight?
result.html: Cad atá faoi chaibidil anochtWhat are we talking about tonight?
result.ponchtml: Cad atá faoi ċaibidil anoċtWhat are we talking about tonight?

result.ga: Is breá liom labhairt le daoine
result.orig: Is breá liom labhairt le daoine
result.html: Is breá liom labhairt le daoineI like talking to people.
result.ponchtml: Is breá liom laḃairt le daoineI like talking to people.

result.eng: We happened to be talking about you just when you came in.
result.ga: Tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteach
result.orig: Tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteach
result.html: Tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteachWe happened to be talking about you just when you came in.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarla go raiḃ muid ag caint fútsa díreaċ nuair a ṫáinig tú isteaċWe happened to be talking about you just when you came in.

result.eng: Welcome back. On the programme today I am talking to Aoife Ní Loideáin.
result.ga: Tá fáilte romhaibh ar ais Ar an chlár inniu tá mé ag caint le Aoife Ní Loideáin
result.orig: Tá fáilte romhaibh ar ais Ar an chlár inniu tá mé ag caint le Aoife Ní Loideáin
result.html: Tá fáilte romhaibh ar ais Ar an chlár inniu tá mé ag caint le Aoife Ní LoideáinWelcome back. On the programme today I am talking to Aoife Ní Loideáin.
result.ponchtml: Tá fáilte roṁaiḃ ar ais Ar an ċlár inniu tá mé ag caint le Aoife Ní LoideáinWelcome back. On the programme today I am talking to Aoife Ní Loideáin.

result.eng: We were just talking about you.
result.ga: Bhí muid díreach ag caint fút
result.orig: Bhí muid díreach ag caint fút
result.html: Bhí muid díreach ag caint fútWe were just talking about you.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí muid díreaċ ag caint fútWe were just talking about you.

result.eng: Goodbye, Siobhán. I'll be talking to you tomorrow.
result.ga: Slán leat a Shiobhán Beidh mé ag caint leat amárach
result.orig: Slán leat a Shiobhán Beidh mé ag caint leat amárach
result.html: Slán leat a Shiobhán Beidh mé ag caint leat amárachGoodbye, Siobhán. I'll be talking to you tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Slán leat a Ṡioḃán Beiḋ mé ag caint leat amáraċGoodbye, Siobhán. I'll be talking to you tomorrow.

result.eng: Who are you to me? [Who are you, stranger, and why are you talking to me?]
result.html: Cé tusa domsaWho are you to me? [Who are you, stranger, and why are you talking to me?]
result.ponchtml: Cé tusa domsaWho are you to me? [Who are you, stranger, and why are you talking to me?]

result.eng: A few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.
result.ga: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáide
result.orig: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáide
result.html: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáideA few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.
result.ponchtml: Traiḋfil blianta ó ẛin ḃíoṫas ag caint ar ḃreacaḋ ré úr do na meáin ċumarsáideA few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.

result.ga: Seo seo tá go leor canta
result.orig: Seo seo tá go leor canta
result.html: Seo seo tá go leor cantaNow now, that's enough talking.
result.ponchtml: Seo seo tá go leor cantaNow now, that's enough talking.

result.eng: There'd be no point for you or me talking to them.
result.ga: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leo
result.orig: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leo
result.html: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leoThere'd be no point for you or me talking to them.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃeaḋ gar doṁsa nó duitse a ḃeiṫ ag caint leoThere'd be no point for you or me talking to them.

result.eng: You could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ga: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.orig: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.html: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ċoṁ maiṫ a ḃeiṫ ag caint leis an ġealaċ le a ḃeiṫ ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.

result.eng: Shut your mouth and stop talking nonsense.
result.ga: Druid do bhéal ó do chuid amaidí
result.orig: Druid do bhéal ó do chuid amaidí
result.html: Druid do bhéal ó do chuid amaidíShut your mouth and stop talking nonsense.
result.ponchtml: Druid do ḃéal ó do ċuid amaidíShut your mouth and stop talking nonsense.

result.eng: I often heard my father talking about you.
result.ga: Is minic a chuala mé m'athair ag scéalaíocht ort
result.orig: Is minic a chuala mé m'athair ag scéalaíocht ort
result.html: Is minic a chuala mé m'athair ag scéalaíocht ortI often heard my father talking about you.
result.ponchtml: Is minic a ċuala mé m'aṫair ag scéalaíoċt ortI often heard my father talking about you.
